definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: † [[שַׁל]] in [[לְַ־הַשַּׁל]] 2Sa 6:7 is disputed; LXX:B om.; A LXXL th= popetei/a?, for his hastiness (prob. from Aram.; cf. men 4elyo0 = suddenly), Vulgate temeritatep; Targun [[על דאשתלי]] because he acted in error (Aram. [[שְׁלִי]], [[שְׁלָא]] err: v. BAram. [[שָׁלוּ]]), hence AV RV for his error; < Th We Dr Bu Now fragm. of [[[ח יׇדוֹ עַל]]] [[שָׁלַ]] [[[אֲשֶׁר]]] [[עַל]], ‖ 1Ch 13:10.
